metadata.name: Privileged Account Creation
metadata.comment: Detects when a new admin is created.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(message), lower('add user')) AND contains(lower(message), lower('add member to role')) AND lower(status_code) = lower('success'))

output.summary: Detects when a new admin is created.

metadata.objective: False positive: A legitimate new admin account being created Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/architecture/security-operations-privileged-accounts#changes-to-privileged-accounts
